name: Income above ACC cap
description: Individual earning NZD 200,000 per year (top tax bracket, ACC levy capped at NZD 152,790)

sources.description: Calculated using 2025-26 PAYE rates, ACC levy, and IETC from IRD
sources.notes: PAYE: All 5 brackets including top 39% rate above $180,000. ACC: Capped at 1.67% of $152,790 = $2,551.59. IETC: $0 (income above $70,000).
